hearts.name: Lovable
hearts.description: You can never take Damage or Face Destiny in a Hearts (â™¥) Challenge.

clubs.name: Imposing
clubs.description: Once per mission, you can intimidate an NPC who is not a Target without performing a Challenge.

spades.name: Change of Strategy
spades.description: At the beginning of each session, take an Ace of your choice from the deck and Steal it, then reshuffle the deck.

daiMoltiTalenti.name: Jack of All Trades
daiMoltiTalenti.description: When performing a Challenge, you fail by drawing the 5th card that doesn't match the Suit, instead of the 4th.

riscuotereUnDebito.name: Collect a Debt
riscuotereUnDebito.description: Once per mission, another player can discard their hand to prevent you from taking Damage. At least one card must be discarded for this to happen.

perUnPelo.name: By a Hair
perUnPelo.description: Once per campaign, turn a Failure obtained in one of your Challenges into a Success. You still lose all cards drawn during the Challenge, as in a Failure.

giocoDiSquadra.name: Teamwork
giocoDiSquadra.description: Three times per mission, successfully Helping another player reduces the Difficulty Level by 2 instead of 1.

pagareIlPrezzo.name: Pay the Price
pagareIlPrezzo.description: Permanently increase one of your Personal Modifiers by 1, then immediately gain 2 new Skills that don't reduce your Personal Modifiers.

abbastanzaStupidoDaFunzionare.name: Crazy Enough to Work
abbastanzaStupidoDaFunzionare.description: Once per mission, you can place the first card of the deck in the Lost Opportunities Pile to obtain a Triumph in a Challenge. Characters can still take Damage. This Skill cannot be used against Targets.

perPrecauzione.name: Just in Case
perPrecauzione.description: When you draw the first card of a Challenge, draw two, keep one and Discard the other. The discarded card has no effect on the Challenge.

hearts.name: Commanding Aura
hearts.description: Twice per mission, you can command an NPC to do something for you without performing a Challenge. You cannot use this Skill against a Target.

clubs.name: In Your Place
clubs.description: At any moment, you can choose to take Damage in place of another Character.

spades.name: Shortcut
spades.description: At the beginning of each mission, after everyone else has triggered their start-of-mission Skills, search the deck for your Face Card, shuffle the deck, and place your Face Card on top.

sacrificio.name: Sacrifice
sacrificio.description: When you get a Failure in a Challenge, you can discard a Face Card used in the Challenge and place the other cards in the Lost Opportunities Pile, or vice versa.

nonOggi.name: Not Today
nonOggi.description: When you Retreat from a Challenge, treat all cards you roll for as if their value were 2 higher.

affidabile.name: Reliable
affidabile.description: Three times per mission, you can Help another player without performing a Challenge.

scudo.name: Shield
scudo.description: Once per mission, you can take the first three Number Cards from the Discard Pile and place them in the Lost Opportunities Pile to avoid taking Damage.

soBadareAMe.name: I Can Handle Myself
soBadareAMe.description: Three times per mission, if no one offers you their Help, you can reduce the Difficulty Level of a Challenge by 1.

inSerbo.name: In Reserve
inSerbo.description: Three times per mission, you can Steal a Number Card that would be lost during a Challenge in which a player has Retreated. You can only play these cards during other players' Challenges.

preveggente.name: Clairvoyant
preveggente.description: Three times per mission, you can look at the first card of the deck during another player's Challenge and reveal what card it is.

hearts.name: Infiltrators
hearts.description: At the beginning of each mission, create an NPC together with the GM. You can encounter them during the mission and they owe you a favor.

clubs.name: All In
clubs.description: You can play 5 cards from your hand to obtain a Critical Success in your current Challenge. You cannot use this Skill against a Target.

spades.name: High Stakes
spades.description: After performing a Challenge, regardless of the result, roll for any cards you played from your hand (as if you had Retreated). Instead of discarding them, take them back into your hand.

qualcosaInPiu.name: A Little Extra
qualcosaInPiu.description: When you get a Critical Success in a Challenge, you can Steal up to two Number Cards used in the Challenge.

premioDiConsolazione.name: Consolation Prize
premioDiConsolazione.description: When you get a Failure in a Challenge, you can Steal a Number Card used in the Challenge.

pianiBenRiusciti.name: Well-Laid Plans
pianiBenRiusciti.description: At the beginning of each mission, draw from the deck until you find two Number Cards and Steal them, then reshuffle the deck.

ilToccoGiusto.name: The Right Touch
ilToccoGiusto.description: When you use your Instrument, your worst Personal Modifier becomes 0. If it's already 0, it becomes -1.

doppioFondo.name: Hidden Compartment
doppioFondo.description: You can conceal weapons or instruments that would normally be too large to be Concealed (if it makes sense).

sempreSulPezzo.name: Always Prepared
sempreSulPezzo.description: At the beginning of each mission, you can choose an additional weapon or instrument of any size that has been hidden in the area where the Target is located.

miSeiDIntralcio.name: You're in My Way
miSeiDIntralcio.description: For the rest of the campaign, you cannot Help or be Helped by any other player. Permanently reduce one of your Personal Modifiers by 1, down to a maximum of -2.

aBitMoreMuscle.name: A Bit More Muscle
aBitMoreMuscle.description: Permanently reduce your Clubs personal modifier by 1, up to a maximum of -2.

aBitMoreBrain.name: A Bit More Brain
aBitMoreBrain.description: Permanently reduce your Hearts personal modifier by 1, up to a maximum of -2.

aBitMoreBalance.name: A Bit More Balance
aBitMoreBalance.description: Permanently reduce your Spades personal modifier by 1, up to a maximum of -2.
